languages.text: При атаке орудия корабля сначала пытаются попасть в цель. Вероятность попадания задается установленным на корабле ауспексом и уменьшается уклонением цели. {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Уклонение{/g} многих кораблей равно 0, но оно может присутствовать у кораблей некоторых ксеносов, и оно всегда достаточно высокое у сравнительно маленьких целей, таких как торпедные залпы.

When attacking, ship weapons first try to hit the target. Hit chance is determined by the ship's auspex and reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}. Many ships in the game have 0 evasion, but certain xenos ships might have some evasion score, and relatively small targets such as torpedo salvos always have high evasion.
languages.original_text: При атаке орудия корабля сначала пытаются попасть в цель. Вероятность попадания задается установленным на корабле ауспексом и уменьшается уклонением цели. {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Уклонение{/g} многих кораблей равно 0, но оно может присутствовать у кораблей некоторых ксеносов, и оно всегда достаточно высокое у сравнительно маленьких целей, таких как торпедные залпы.

traits.locale_text: When attacking, ship weapons first try to hit the target. Hit chance is determined by the ship's auspex and reduced by the target's evasion. Many ships in the game have 0 evasion, but certain xenos ships might have some evasion score, and relatively small targets such as torpedo salvos always have high evasion.

When attacking, ship weapons first try to hit the target. Hit chance is determined by the ship's auspex and reduced by the target's evasion. Many ships in the game have 0 evasion, but certain xenos ships might have some evasion score, and relatively small targets such as torpedo salvos always have high evasion.

When attacking, ship weapons first try to hit the target. Hit chance is determined by the ship's auspex and reduced by the target's evasion. Many ships in the game have 0 evasion, but certain xenos ships might have some evasion score, and relatively small targets such as torpedo salvos always have high evasion.

When attacking, ship weapons first try to hit the target. Hit chance is determined by the ship's auspex and reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}. Many ships in the game have 0 evasion, but certain xenos ships might have some evasion score, and relatively small targets such as torpedo salvos always have high evasion.

When attacking, ship weapons first try to hit the target. Hit chance is determined by the ship's auspex and reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}. Many ships in the game have 0 evasion, but certain xenos ships might have some evasion score, and relatively small targets such as torpedo salvos always have high evasion.

languages.text: Bei einem Angriff versuchen Schiffswaffen zunächst, das Ziel zu treffen. Die Trefferchance wird vom Auspex des Schiffs bestimmt und um das {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Ausweichen{/g} des Ziels reduziert. Viele Schiffe im Spiel haben 0 Ausweichen, aber einige Xenos-Schiffe könnten einen Ausweichen-Wert besitzen und verhältnismäßig kleine Ziele wie Torpedosalven haben immer hohes Ausweichen.
languages.original_text: When attacking, ship weapons first try to hit the target. Hit chance is determined by the ship's auspex and reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}. Many ships in the game have 0 evasion, but certain xenos ships might have some evasion score, and relatively small targets such as torpedo salvos always have high evasion.

traits.locale_text: Bei einem Angriff versuchen Schiffswaffen zunächst, das Ziel zu {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}treffen{/g}. Die {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g} wird vom Auspex des Schiffs bestimmt und um das {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Ausweichen{/g} des Ziels reduziert. Viele Schiffe im Spiel haben 0 Ausweichen, aber einige Xenos-Schiffe könnten einen Ausweichen-Wert besitzen und verhältnismäßig kleine Ziele wie Torpedosalven haben immer hohes Ausweichen.

languages.text: Lors de l'attaque, les armes du vaisseau tentent d'abord d'atteindre la cible. Les chances de toucher sont déterminées par l'auspex du vaisseau et réduites par l'{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}évitement{/g} de la cible. De nombreux vaisseaux du jeu présentent un score d'évitement de 0, mais certains vaisseaux xénos peuvent afficher un score d'évitement plus élevé, et des cibles relativement petites comme les salves de torpilles sont dotées d'une grande capacité d'évitement.
languages.original_text: When attacking, ship weapons first try to hit the target. Hit chance is determined by the ship's auspex and reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}. Many ships in the game have 0 evasion, but certain xenos ships might have some evasion score, and relatively small targets such as torpedo salvos always have high evasion.

traits.locale_text: Lors de l'attaque, les armes du vaisseau tentent d'abord d'{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}atteindre{/g} la cible. Les {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} sont déterminées par l'auspex du vaisseau et réduites par l'{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}évasion{/g} de la cible. De nombreux vaisseaux du jeu présentent une évasion nulle, mais certains vaisseaux xénos peuvent afficher un certain score d'évasion, et des cibles relativement petites telles que les salves de torpilles sont dotées d'une grande capacité d'évasion.

languages.text: 在攻击时，舰载武器会尝试朝目标开火，命中目标。武器的命中率由舰船装备的俄歇矩阵决定，还会受目标的{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}闪避{/g}影响。游戏中许多舰船的闪避都默认为0，不过部分异形舰船可能有闪避能力。而相对较小的目标，如鱼雷集群，闪避率则相当高。
languages.original_text: When attacking, ship weapons first try to hit the target. Hit chance is determined by the ship's auspex and reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}. Many ships in the game have 0 evasion, but certain xenos ships might have some evasion score, and relatively small targets such as torpedo salvos always have high evasion.

traits.locale_text: 在攻击时，舰载武器会尝试朝目标开火，{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}目标。武器的{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}由舰船装备的俄歇矩阵决定，还会受目标的{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}闪避{/g}影响。游戏中许多舰船的闪避都默认为0，不过部分异形舰船可能有闪避能力。而相对较小的目标，如鱼雷集群，闪避率则相当高。

languages.text: A la hora de atacar, las armas de la nave intentarán impactar en primera instancia al objetivo. La probabilidad de impacto viene dada por el aúspex de la nave y queda reducida por la {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}esquiva{/g} del objetivo. Muchas naves del juego tienen 0 puntos de esquiva, pero no es el caso de ciertas naves xenos, que pueden presentar algo de esquiva, y de algunos objetivos pequeños, como las salvas de torpedos, que siempre cuentan con un índice alto de esquiva.
languages.original_text: When attacking, ship weapons first try to hit the target. Hit chance is determined by the ship's auspex and reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}. Many ships in the game have 0 evasion, but certain xenos ships might have some evasion score, and relatively small targets such as torpedo salvos always have high evasion.

traits.locale_text: A la hora de atacar, las armas de la nave intentarán {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impactar{/g} en primera instancia al objetivo. La {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} viene dada por el aúspex de la nave y queda reducida por la {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}esquiva{/g} del objetivo. Muchas naves del juego tienen 0 puntos de esquiva, pero no es el caso de ciertas naves xenos, que pueden presentar algo de esquiva, y de algunos objetivos pequeños, como las salvas de torpedos, que siempre cuentan con un índice alto de esquiva.

languages.original_text: When attacking, the ship's guns first try to hit the target. The probability of a hit is set by the auspex set on the ship and reduced by the target's evasion. Many ships have an evasion of 0, but it may be present on some xenos ships, and it is always quite high on relatively small targets such as torpedo salvos.

languages.text: 攻撃の際は、船の武器はまずターゲットに命中しようとする。命中率は船のアウスペクスにより決定し、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}回避{/g}により減少する。ゲーム内の多くの船は回避が０であるものの、一部の異種族の船は回避スコアがある場合があり、また魚雷斉射等の比較的小さいターゲットに対しては総じて回避スコアが高い傾向にある。
languages.original_text: When attacking, ship weapons first try to hit the target. Hit chance is determined by the ship's auspex and reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}. Many ships in the game have 0 evasion, but certain xenos ships might have some evasion score, and relatively small targets such as torpedo salvos always have high evasion.

traits.locale_text: 攻撃の際は、船の武器はまずターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}しようとする。{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}は船のアウスペクスにより決定し、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}回避{/g}により減少する。ゲーム内の多くの船は回避が０であるものの、一部の異種族の船は回避スコアがある場合があり、また魚雷斉射等の比較的小さいターゲットに対しては総じて回避スコアが高い傾向にある。

languages.text: Saldırırken, gemi silahları önce hedefi vurmaya çalışır. Vuruş olasılığı, geminin uzgörenine göre belirlenir ve hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}sıyrılma{/g} değerine bağlı olarak azalır. Oyundaki pek çok geminin kaçınma değeri 0'dır ancak bazı zeno gemileri, bir miktar kaçınma puanına sahip olabilirler ve torpido salvosu gibi nispeten küçük hedeflerin kaçınma değeri her daim yüksektir.
languages.original_text: When attacking, ship weapons first try to hit the target. Hit chance is determined by the ship's auspex and reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}. Many ships in the game have 0 evasion, but certain xenos ships might have some evasion score, and relatively small targets such as torpedo salvos always have high evasion.
